8 That sounds right !	Great ! Can I take your name ? api_call getCustomerName

6 Hmm , can I change to a mocha instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium mocha . Is that right ?
7 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Mireille .
8 Have a nice day !	Have a nice day !

3 Nice of you to remember ! But I will take something else . May I get an espresso ?	Which size ?
4 Small cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 No , that is it .	So that would be a small espresso . Is that right ?
6 I want a latte .	Sure ! So that would be a small latte . Is that right ?
7 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Ginnifer .
8 Enjoy your day !	Have a nice day !

6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , David .

3 No , not today . I would like a peppermint hot chocolate , please .	Which size ?
4 Medium , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Yes , a blueberry oatmeal , please .	So that would be a medium peppermint hot chocolate and a blueberry oatmeal . Is that right ?
6 Can I have a chocolate chip cookie instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium peppermint hot chocolate and a chocolate chip cookie . Is that right ?
7 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Robert .
8 Have a great day !	Have a nice day !

3 No , not today . A white hot chocolate .	Which size ?
4 Medium would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 No , thanks .	So that would be a medium white hot chocolate . Is that right ?
6 Hmm , can I change to an iced hot chocolate instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium iced hot chocolate . Is that right ?
7 Can I get a breakfast tea ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium breakfast tea . Is that right ?
8 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Joel .
9 Enjoy your day !	Have a nice day !

7 Actually , I would like large instead .	Sure ! So that would be a large cappuccino and a slice of banana bread . Is that right ?
8 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Jennifer .
9 Okay .	Have a nice day !

3 I will try something else . Can I have an espresso , please ?	Which size ?
4 Medium , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a medium espresso . Is that right ?
6 Sorry , I would like to change that to small .	Sure ! So that would be a small espresso . Is that right ?
7 May I get large ?	Sure ! So that would be a large espresso . Is that right ?
8 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , David .
9 Goodbye !	Have a nice day !

3 Maybe not this time ! I want a salted caramel hot chocolate , please .	Which size ?
4 Medium , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Just the drink .	So that would be a medium salted caramel hot chocolate . Is that right ?
6 No , I want a breakfast tea .	Sure ! So that would be a medium breakfast tea . Is that right ?
7 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Matthew .
8 Have a nice day !	Have a nice day !

1 True , 47 , Ty Burrell , medium , espresso con panna
2 Hi !	Hello , Ty Burrell ! Would you like to have a medium espresso con panna again ?
3 I will try something else . An espresso , please .	Which size ?
4 Small , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Could I get a blueberry muffin ?	So that would be a small espresso and a blueberry muffin . Is that right ?
6 Erm , I would like a gingerbread cookie actually .	Sure ! So that would be a small espresso and a gingerbread cookie . Is that right ?
7 I think I will switch small with large .	Sure ! So that would be a large espresso and a gingerbread cookie . Is that right ?
8 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Ty .
9 Bye !	Have a nice day !
